comments:
Build 20021114

Steps to reproduce from a new workspace:

1) File > New > Project > java Project
2) Enter project name, hit finish.
3) File > New > Scrapbook page.
4) Give it a name, hit enter
5) Add the following to the page:

int i = 5;
i++;

6) Hit Ctrl+A to select all, and Ctrl+D to evaluate

An internal error occurs.  The stack appears on the console, not in the log. 
There are other interesting error messages in the log file (attached).  The
console shows:

java.lang.NullPointerException
        at org.eclipse.debug.internal.ui.LazyModelPresentation.computeDetail(Laz
yModelPresentation.java:75)
        at org.eclipse.jdt.internal.debug.ui.snippeteditor.JavaSnippetEditor.eva
luateToString(JavaSnippetEditor.java:698)
        at org.eclipse.jdt.internal.debug.ui.snippeteditor.JavaSnippetEditor.dis
playResult(JavaSnippetEditor.java:672)
        at org.eclipse.jdt.internal.debug.ui.snippeteditor.JavaSnippetEditor.eva
luationComplete(JavaSnippetEditor.java:569)
        at org.eclipse.jdt.internal.debug.eval.LocalEvaluationEngine.evaluationC
omplete(LocalEvaluationEngine.java:921)
        at org.eclipse.jdt.internal.debug.eval.LocalEvaluationEngine$1.run(Local
EvaluationEngine.java:440)
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:498)

Created an attachment (id=2441)
log file showing stack traces
